page.title: 11THERMAL ENGINEERING LTD.
page.content: {Thermal Engineering Ltd.}specialise in manufacturing systems to{extract heat {from the air}to heat homes, factories and greenhouses. They also make dehumidifiers for greenhouses. They employ 6 people full-time and also have 4 trainees. They manufacture a range of basic products for domestic and industrial use but are also often involved in making 'one-off' systems to meet a customers particular specifications. They design their own systems and get most of their components from a Bristol Warehouse which is supplied mainly by Scandinavian Countries. Other parts are purchased according to prevailing prices. At present they can turn out 2-3 large units or 4-5 small units per week. They expect demand to increase as people become more concerned about the need to conserve energy.
